net.gini.android.vision.review

Interface ReviewFragmentListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReviewActivity

    public interface ReviewFragmentListener

    Interface used by ReviewFragmentStandard and ReviewFragmentCompat to dispatch events to the hosting Activity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDocumentReviewedAndAnalyzed(Document document)
      Called if you called ReviewFragmentStandard.onDocumentAnalyzed() or ReviewFragmentCompat.onDocumentAnalyzed() and the image wasn't changed and the user tapped on the Next button.
      void onDocumentWasRotated(Document document, int oldRotation, int newRotation)
      Called when the user rotated the image.
      void onError(GiniVisionError error)
      Called when an error occurred.
      void onProceedToAnalysisScreen(Document document)
      Called if you didn't call ReviewFragmentStandard.onDocumentAnalyzed() or ReviewFragmentCompat.onDocumentAnalyzed() or the image was changed and the user tapped on the Next button.
      void onShouldAnalyzeDocument(Document document)
      Called when the Review Fragment was started and you should start analyzing the original document by sending it to the Gini API.

    • Method Detail

      • onShouldAnalyzeDocument

        void onShouldAnalyzeDocument(Document document)

        Called when the Review Fragment was started and you should start analyzing the original document by sending it to the Gini API.

        We assume that in most cases the photo is good enough and this way we are able to provide analysis results quicker.

        Note: Call ReviewFragmentStandard.onDocumentAnalyzed() or ReviewFragmentCompat.onDocumentAnalyzed() when the analysis is done and your Activity wasn't stopped.

        Parameters:
        document - contains the original image taken by the camera

      • onProceedToAnalysisScreen

        void onProceedToAnalysisScreen(Document document)

        Called if you didn't call ReviewFragmentStandard.onDocumentAnalyzed() or ReviewFragmentCompat.onDocumentAnalyzed() or the image was changed and the user tapped on the Next button.

        You should start your Activity extending AnalysisActivity and set the document as the AnalysisActivity.EXTRA_IN_DOCUMENT extra.

        Parameters:
        document - contains the reviewed image (can be the original one or a modified image)

      • onDocumentReviewedAndAnalyzed

        void onDocumentReviewedAndAnalyzed(Document document)

        Called if you called ReviewFragmentStandard.onDocumentAnalyzed() or ReviewFragmentCompat.onDocumentAnalyzed() and the image wasn't changed and the user tapped on the Next button.

        You should finish your Activity and proceed to handling the results of the analysis.

        Parameters:
        document - contains the reviewed image (can be the original one or a modified image)

      • onDocumentWasRotated

        void onDocumentWasRotated(Document document,
                          int oldRotation,
                          int newRotation)

        Called when the user rotated the image.

        In case you started the document analysis in ReviewFragmentListener.onShouldAnalyzeDocument(Document) you should cancel it here as the original image is not valid anymore.

        Parameters:
        document - contains the modified image
        oldRotation - the previous rotation in degrees
        newRotation - the new rotation in degrees

      • onError

        void onError(GiniVisionError error)

        Called when an error occurred.

        Parameters:
        error - details about what went wrong
